name: ng2-integrator
description: the integrator for multiple angular 2 apps on one page

scripts.install: npm run initOne && npm run initTwo
scripts.initOne: cd App-One/ && npm install && cd node_modules && ln -s ../../ng2-shared ng2-shared
scripts.initTwo: cd App-Two/ && npm install && cd node_modules && ln -s ../../ng2-shared ng2-shared
scripts.build: npm run buildOne && npm run buildTwo && npm run buildShared

author: Janis Koehr
